namespace  xint

Montgomery Reduction functions

 Returns the Montgomery form of a number. Used for testing.

 Returns the Montgomery equivalent of mulmod(a, b, n). Used internally.
integer xint::montgomeryPowerMod (const integer &a, const integer &e, const integer &n)
 Returns the Montgomery equivalent of powmod(a, b, n). Used internally.

Detailed Description

Internally-used functions.

This file declares the functions that use the Montgomery Reduction. They are used internally to speed up the xint::powmod function for odd modulii.
